rationale: The segment does not contain an intensifier or comparative adjective directly modifying a risk-adjective.
The segment uses neutral language ('will also be quarantined and killed off') and a Q4 Reassuring cue ('so far no human cases ... have been detected').
The verbs ('infected', 'quarantined', 'killed off', 'detected') are neutral or containment verbs. 'will also be quarantined and killed off' refers to a future action/plan.
The segment does not contain a loaded rhetorical question.
The segment reports actions taken ('will also be quarantined and killed off') and a bare negation ('so far no human cases') which falls under Q7.
